Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Alcohol and Tobacco Tax and Trade Bureau
Additional Scope Comments: Cut off in five-year blocks at the end of the calendar year; transfer email records 15 years after the cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: TTB will apply the Capstone approach to email records management (GRS 6.1) retrospectively to all available legacy email.  TTB has some permanent email from accounts that pre-date 2003 that were active at the time of re-organization, which originated with TTB's predecessor organization within the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms (ATF).  Email from accounts inactive at the time of re-organization were not transferred to TTB.  ATF is responsible for managing these records.  Also, pre-dated 2003 printed email records are maintained in respective industry/case file disposed as per record schedule.

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: U.S. Department of Energy/Energy Information Administration (EIA)
Additional Scope Comments: Energy Information Administration is a component of the Department of Energy with its own records  management office. Non-Capstone officials , staff, contractors and other support and/or administrative positions will be managed as temporary email (retained for 7 years) scheduled under  GRS 6.1, item 011 or as temporary email (retained for 3 years) scheduled under GRS 6.1, item 012.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be by employee tenure
Transfer Instructions: Records will be transferred when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: Legacy email is not included in the Capstone categorization, as traditional records management with a print-and-file policy was followed prior to Capstone adoption.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: http://www.eia.gov/about/printer_friendly_org_chart.pdf Please see attached EIA organizational chart
Contact Information for Agency Records O: Donna Williams, EIA Records Officer Email:  Donna.Williams@eia.govTel: 202.586.3270

Name of Agency to Which this Form Applie: Department of Energy, National Nuclear Security Administration
Additional Scope Comments: The National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA) is a semi-autonomous agency under the US Department of Energy and will submit a separate NA-1005 with the NNSA Administrator identified in Category 1.  NNSA will use Schedule Items 010 and 011 but will not use Item 012.  NNSA does not have enough positions that would fall under Item 012 to warrant use of the three year retention.
Legacy Email Scope: Email capture will be "point-forward" upon approval of this NA-1005 by NARA.  Estimated implementation date 01/01/2017.  The legacy process for email was print-to-file and will be in place until full Capstone implementation.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: An organization chart depicting the NNSA organization and management structure is not available on-line.  A file is attached to this form which defines the organization and management structure as well as the position functions identified as Capstone Officials.
Category 2 Position Title/Role and Numbe: Principal Deputy Administrator, 1;  Deputy Administrators (2 positions), 2; Associate Administrators (8 positions), 8
